dc_title_s: Mexico & Guatemala / by H.S. Tanner ; engraved by J. Knight.; Mexico and Guatemala
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures. "Entered according to Act of Congress, in the year 1834 by H.S. Tanner, in the Clerks Office of the Eastern District of Pennsylvania." Prime meridian: Washington. Insets: Valley of Mexico -- Guatemala. In upper margin: Tanner's Universal Atlas. In lower right margin: 30. From Tanner's "A New Universal Atlas Containing Maps of the various Empires, Kingdoms, States and Republics Of The World" which was published in 1836. 1 map : col. ; 28 x 35 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Tanner, Henry Schenck, 1786-1858. New universal atlas. Plate no. 30.
